channel.title: Projects on Dr. Yue Hu's Personal Page
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Dr. Yue Hu's Personal Page

item.title: Political Linguistics
item.description: The project aims to promote the theoretical development of an interdisciplinary area of political science and linguistics. I also hope to raise the attention to language and language policy in the research of majority/general politics and governance.

item.title: Inequality and Public Opinions
item.description: The project explores how the macro socioeconomic inequality influences the micro individual political perceptions, attitudes, and behaviors.

item.title: Urbanization and Urban Politics
item.description: The project focuses on the features and dynamics of citizens’ political perceptions under the urbanization.

item.title: Governance and Mass Response
item.description: The project focuses on the public responses (features, dynamics, and motivations) to the governance and other govermental policies.
